t: Vindicate*pn me, Lord,*s for*ld I have led a blameless life; I*ln have trusted in the Lord*s and*ld have not faltered.
Test*ln me, Lord,*s and try me, examine*ld my heart and my mind;
for*ln I have always been mindful of your unfailing love and*ld have lived in reliance on your faithfulness.
I*pn do not sit with the deceitful, nor*ld do I associate with hypocrites.
I*ln abhor the assembly of evildoers and*ld refuse to sit with the wicked.
I*ln wash my hands in innocence, and*ld go about your altar, Lord,*s
proclaiming*ln aloud your praise and*ld telling of all your wonderful deeds.
Lord,*spn I love the house where you live, the*ld place where your glory dwells.
Do*ln not take away my soul along with sinners, my*ld life with those who are bloodthirsty,
in*ln whose hands are wicked schemes, whose*ld right hands are full of bribes.
I*ln lead a blameless life; deliver*ld me and be merciful to me.
My*pn feet stand on level ground; in*ld the great congregation I will praise the Lord.*s
